column4: I want to automate UBUNTU install using PXE for my company, roll out about 50 or so machines. Does anyone know of a good step by step article that may help me with this? I am no Ubuntu expert but I have a couple of years support experience so I am not a newbie either.
there are some docs I was just reading to try to help a friend about it: https://help.ubuntu.com/9.04/installation-guide/powerpc/preseed-contents.html
thanks for that link, also looks like a good read
